name: Elixir of the Heretic
description:
A vial found in the heretical testing grounds after defeating the false god that usurped the moon.
For centuries, self-proclaimed scholars have crawled beneath the weight of the six cardinal prohibitions, their studies little more than circular reasoning and empty words. The pursuit of truth should know no bounds â€” by this measure, those condemned as heretics by the world are the truest seekers of knowledge.
